title: Are You Riding for Your Ex
itunes:title: Are You Riding for Your Ex
description:
Today on the show we opened up the phone lines to see if any of our listeners would ride for their ex like how Monica is fighting for her ex C- Murda to be released form prison? Moreovoer, we also had Louis Gossett and Stacey Tisdale call in to speak on the roots of racism, segregated housing market and more. And Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to celebrity and chief Donald Trump for blocking mail in ballots.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

Today on the show we opened up the phone lines to see if any of our listeners would ride for their ex like how Monica is fighting for her ex C- Murda to be released form prison?
